page.title: 16Day in the life of....
page.content: { ...Emmeline Shadrach, aged 9....} 7.45.Get up & have breakfast of milk & 'Rice Krispies'. Then put on my School uniform, a blue & white check dress & blue cardigan. School starts{ 8.55. We go to{Assembly}& then to class for 1st lesson, {Maths. 10.30}out to play for 15 minutes..hopscotch, it, hide-&- seek & sticker. Back in the classroom for{English}till{12.00.}Hurray!-- it's DINNER-TIME! I'm hungry! Chicken Pie & Ice-cream..SUPER!! {1.15.}more lessons till{3.30.}Home in Mum's car.{Brownies tonight! Lovely! I'm "sixer"of{Sprites group. The other groups are {Pixies , {Gnomes, Elves, & Kelpies.}It's 20p per week for 1\ hours. We play games & collect interest badges ( I have 13 ). Our motto is{"Lend a Hand".} Now it's {piano practice,} hot bath & bed , read "101 Dalmations" till Mum brings me a hot drink & biscuit.{8.00.I'm asleep!
